SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.socket

Interface SocketManager.PacketReplyContext<ACK_IN extends AckPacket,ACK_OUT extends AckPacket,T extends Packet>

Type Parameters:
ACK_IN - type of AckPacket that can be received
ACK_OUT - type of AckPacket that can be sent
T - type of Packet
All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
Enclosing interface:
SocketManager<IN extends Packet,ACK_IN extends AckPacket,ACK_OUT extends AckPacket,OUT extends Packet>
public static interface SocketManager.PacketReplyContext<ACK_IN extends AckPacket,ACK_OUT extends AckPacket,T extends Packet> extends Closeable
Context of a Packet Wraps a SimpleSeqPacket and allows to ack and reply

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    ack()
    Send a SimpleAckPacket with the SeqAckPacket.seqAck() of this packet
    void
    close()
    Replies with a simple ack packet, as ack() would do, only if none were already sent
    T
    getPacket()
    Extract the Packet from the SimpleSeqPacket wrapped in this context
    void
    reply(ACK_OUT p)
    Reply with the given packet This will also acknowledge the current packet
    <R extends ACK_IN>
    SocketManager.PacketReplyContext<ACK_IN,ACK_OUT,R>
    reply(ACK_OUT p, Class<R> replyType)
    Reply with the given packet This will also acknowledge the current packet

  • Method Details

    • getPacket

      T getPacket()
      Extract the Packet from the SimpleSeqPacket wrapped in this context
      Returns:
      the packet contained in the SimpleSeqPacket

    • ack

      void ack() throws IOException
      Send a SimpleAckPacket with the SeqAckPacket.seqAck() of this packet
      Throws:
      IOException - if sending fails
      InterruptedIOException - if interrupted while sending

    • close

      void close() throws IOException
      Replies with a simple ack packet, as ack() would do, only if none were already sent
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable
      Throws:
      IOException - if sending fails
      InterruptedIOException - if interrupted while sending

    • reply

      void reply(ACK_OUT p) throws IOException
      Reply with the given packet This will also acknowledge the current packet
      Parameters:
      p - packet to send
      Throws:
      IOException - if sending and/or receiving fails
      InterruptedIOException - if interrupted while sending and/or receiving

    • reply

      <R extends ACK_IN> SocketManager.PacketReplyContext<ACK_IN,ACK_OUT,R> reply(ACK_OUT p, Class<R> replyType) throws IOException
      Reply with the given packet This will also acknowledge the current packet
      Parameters:
      p - packet to send
      replyType - type of the AckPacket to wait for
      Returns:
      context of the received AckPacket
      Throws:
      IOException - if sending and/or receiving fails
      InterruptedIOException - if interrupted while sending and/or receiving
